actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Buffalo National River, Arkansas Establishment Act of 1972 to increase the authorization for land acquisition.

summary.text: Increases the amount authorized to be appropriated for acquisition of lands and interests in lands within the boundaries of the Buffalo National River, Arkansas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Buffalo National River, Arkansas Establishment Act of 1972 to increase the authorization for land acquisition.
